reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Very approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. Exams are fair though.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee breaks down complex math concepts into digestible pieces. His problem sets are tough but helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lab sessions are fantastic! She makes organic chemistry fun and interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable but often goes off-topic. Grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Greene's passion for literature is evident. Her essay prompts are thought-provoking and encourage creativity.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov is a genius! His demonstrations make complex physics concepts come alive.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Sanchez assigns interesting readings, but her lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Cooper relates economic theories to real-world scenarios effectively. His exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Yamamoto's lectures are like taking a journey through time. Her enthusiasm is infectious!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's lectures are monotonous and he rarely engages with students. Assignments are unclear.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Watson explains complex neural mechanisms clearly. Her research insights are fascinating.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Ali brings a wealth of real-world experience to the classroom. Discussions are always enlightening.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is knowledgeable but can be disorganized. Field trips are the highlight of her course.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Mueller challenges students to think critically. His Socratic method can be intimidating but effective.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's firsthand research experiences make her lectures come alive. She's incredibly supportive of students.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Smith seems more interested in his consulting work than teaching. Lectures lack depth and relevance.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's enthusiasm for language is contagious. Her assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Mendez is a musical genius! His composition workshops are incredibly inspiring and instructive.
